name: Bulbasaur
description: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.

name: Ivysaur
description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

name: Venusaur

attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

description: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Caterpie

attacks.effect: Put 1 random[G]Pokémon from your deck into your hand.

description: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.

name: Metapod
description: It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.

name: Butterfree

abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.

description: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

name: Weedle
description: Often found in forests and grasslands. It has a sharp, toxic barb of around two inches on top of its head.

name: Kakuna
description: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself when it is in danger.

name: Beedrill
description: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

name: Oddish
description: If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move. It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.

name: Gloom
description: Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor. The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance of 1.25 miles.

name: Vileplume

attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

description: It has the world’s largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

name: Paras
description: The mushrooms, known as tochukaso, are controlling the bug. Even if the bug bugs the mushrooms, they tell it to bug off.

name: Parasect
description: The bug is mostly dead, with the mushroom on its back having become the main body. If the mushroom comes off, the bug stops moving.

name: Venonat
description: Poison oozes from all over its body. It catches small bug Pokémon at night that are attracted by light.

name: Venomoth

attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

description: The wings are covered with dustlike scales. Every time it flaps its wings, it looses highly toxic dust.

name: Bellsprout
description: Even though its body is extremely skinny, it is blindingly fast when catching its prey.

name: Weepinbell
description: The leafy parts act as cutters for slashing foes. It spits a fluid that dissolves everything.

name: Victreebel

abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, once during your turn, you may switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Basic Pokémon to the Active Spot.

description: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.

name: Exeggcute
description: Though it may look like it’s just a bunch of eggs, it’s a proper Pokémon. Exeggcute communicates with others of its kind via telepathy, apparently.

name: Exeggutor

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

description: Each of Exeggutor’s three heads is thinking different thoughts. The three don’t seem to be very interested in one another.

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Tangela

attacks.effect: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

description: Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that grows nonstop even if the vines are torn off, this Pokémon’s true appearance remains a mystery.

name: Scyther
description: It slashes through grass with its sharp scythes, moving too fast for the human eye to track.

name: Pinsir

attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.

description: These Pokémon judge one another based on pincers. Thicker, more impressive pincers make for more popularity with the opposite gender.

name: Cottonee
description: It shoots cotton from its body to protect itself. If it gets caught up in hurricane-strength winds, it can get sent to the other side of the Earth.

name: Whimsicott
description: It scatters cotton all over the place as a prank. If it gets wet, it’ll become too heavy to move and have no choice but to answer for its mischief.

name: Petilil

attacks.effect: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

description: The leaves on its head grow right back even if they fall out. These bitter leaves refresh those who eat them.

name: Lilligant

attacks.effect: Take a[G]Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched[G]Pokémon.

description: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect, but taking care of it is very difficult.

name: Skiddo

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

description: Until recently, people living in the mountains would ride on the backs of these Pokémon to traverse the mountain paths.

name: Gogoat
description: It can sense the feelings of others by touching them with its horns. This species has assisted people with their work since 5,000 years ago.

name: Charmander

attacks.effect: Discard a[R]Energy from this Pokémon.

description: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

name: Charmeleon
description: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

name: Charizard

attacks.effect: Discard 2[R]Energy from this Pokémon.

description: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.

attacks.effect: Discard 2[R]Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Vulpix

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

description: While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it grows, several new tails are sprouted.

name: Ninetales

attacks.effect: Discard a[R]Energy from this Pokémon.

description: It is said to live 1,000 years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers.

name: Growlithe
description: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.

name: Arcanine

attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

description: An ancient picture scroll shows that people were captivated by its movement as it ran through prairies.

attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

name: Ponyta
description: It can’t run properly when it’s newly born. As it races around with others of its kind, its legs grow stronger.

name: Rapidash
description: This Pokémon can be seen galloping through fields at speeds of up to 150 mph, its fiery mane fluttering in the wind.

name: Magmar
description: Magmar dispatches its prey with fire. But it regrets this habit once it realizes that it has burned its intended prey to a charred crisp.

name: Flareon

attacks.effect: Discard 1[R]Energy from this Pokémon.

description: Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac, heated, and exhaled as fire that reaches over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Moltres

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

description: It’s one of the legendary bird Pokémon. When Moltres flaps its flaming wings, they glimmer with a dazzling red glow.

attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. Take an amount of[R]Energy from your Energy Zone equal to the number of heads and attach it to your Benched[R]Pokémon in any way you like.

name: Heatmor
description: There’s a hole in its tail that allows it to draw in the air it needs to keep its fire burning. If the hole gets blocked, this Pokémon will fall ill.

name: Salandit
description: It taunts its prey and lures them into narrow, rocky areas where it then sprays them with toxic gas to make them dizzy and take them down.

name: Salazzle
description: Salazzle makes its opponents light-headed with poisonous gas, then captivates them with alluring movements to turn them into loyal servants.

name: Sizzlipede
description: It stores flammable gas in its body and uses it to generate heat. The yellow sections on its belly get particularly hot.

name: Centiskorch

attacks.effect: Discard a[R]Energy from this Pokémon.

description: When it heats up, its body temperature reaches about 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit. It lashes its body like a whip and launches itself at enemies.

name: Squirtle
description: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

name: Wartortle
description: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.

name: Blastoise

attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra[W]Energy attached, this attack does 60 more damage.

description: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra[W]Energy attached, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Psyduck

attacks.effect: Your opponent can't use any Supporter cards from their hand during their next turn.

description: It is constantly wracked by a headache. When the headache turns intense, it begins using mysterious powers.

name: Golduck
description: When it swims at full speed using its long, webbed limbs, its forehead somehow begins to glow.

name: Poliwag
description: For Poliwag, swimming is easier than walking. The swirl pattern on its belly is actually part of the Pokémon’s innards showing through the skin.

name: Poliwhirl
description: Staring at the swirl on its belly causes drowsiness. This trait of Poliwhirl’s has been used in place of lullabies to get children to go to sleep.

name: Poliwrath

abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

description: Its body is solid muscle. When swimming through cold seas, Poliwrath uses its impressive arms to smash through drift ice and plow forward.

name: Tentacool
description: Tentacool is not a particularly strong swimmer. It drifts across the surface of shallow seas as it searches for prey.

name: Tentacruel

attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

description: When the red orbs on Tentacruel’s head glow brightly, watch out. The Pokémon is about to fire off a burst of ultrasonic waves.

name: Seel
description: Thanks to its thick fat, cold seas don’t bother it at all, but it gets tired pretty easily in warm waters.

name: Dewgong
description: It sunbathes on the beach after meals. The rise in its body temperature helps its digestion.

name: Shellder
description: It is encased in a shell that is harder than diamond. Inside, however, it is surprisingly tender.

name: Cloyster

abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes -10 damage from attacks.

description: Cloyster that live in seas with harsh tidal currents grow large, sharp spikes on their shells.

name: Krabby
description: It can be found near the sea. The large pincers grow back if they are torn out of their sockets.

name: Kingler

attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, this attack does 80 more damage.

description: Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.

name: Horsea
description: Horsea makes its home in oceans with gentle currents. If this Pokémon is under attack, it spits out pitch-black ink and escapes.

name: Seadra

attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

description: It’s the males that raise the offspring. While Seadra are raising young, the spines on their backs secrete thicker and stronger poison.

name: Goldeen
description: Its dorsal, pectoral, and tail fins wave elegantly in water. That is why it is known as the Water Dancer.

name: Seaking

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

description: In autumn, its body becomes more fatty in preparing to propose to a mate. It takes on beautiful colors.

name: Staryu
description: If you visit a beach at the end of summer, you’ll be able to see groups of Staryu lighting up in a steady rhythm.

name: Starmie
description: This Pokémon has an organ known as its core. The organ glows in seven colors when Starmie is unleashing its potent psychic powers.

name: Magikarp
description: An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It may jump high on rare occasions but never more than seven feet.

name: Gyarados

attacks.effect: Discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

description: Once it appears, it goes on a rampage. It remains enraged until it demolishes everything around it.

name: Lapras

attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra[W]Energy attached, this attack does 70 more damage.

description: A smart and kindhearted Pokémon, it glides across the surface of the sea while its beautiful song echoes around it.

name: Vaporeon

attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

description: It lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin, which is often mistaken for a mermaid’s.

name: Omanyte
description: Because some Omanyte manage to escape after being restored or are released into the wild by people, this species is becoming a problem.

name: Omastar

attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't attack.

description: Weighed down by a large and heavy shell, Omastar couldn’t move very fast. Some say it went extinct because it was unable to catch food.

name: Articuno

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

description: It’s said that this Pokémon’s beautiful blue wings are made of ice. Articuno flies over snowy mountains, its long tail fluttering along behind it.

attacks.effect: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Ducklett
description: When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.

name: Swanna
description: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.

name: Froakie
description: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.

name: Frogadier
description: It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise  control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.

name: Greninja

abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may do 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

description: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water.  When it spins them and throws them at high speed,  these stars can split metal in two.

name: Pyukumuku
description: It lives in warm, shallow waters. If it encounters a foe, it will spit out its internal organs as a means to punch them.

name: Bruxish

attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has damage on it, this attack does 60 more damage.

description: It grinds its teeth with great force to stimulate its brain. It fires the psychic energy created by this process from the protuberance on its head.

name: Snom
description: It eats snow that has accumulated on the ground. It prefers soft, freshly fallen snow, so it will eat its way up a mountain, aiming for the peak.

name: Frosmoth

attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

description: Frosmoth senses air currents with its antennae. It sends its scales drifting on frigid air, making them fall like snow.

name: Pikachu
description: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

name: Raichu

attacks.effect: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

description: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.

attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage for each of your Benched[L]Pokémon.

name: Magnemite
description: The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which allows it to float.

name: Magneton

abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may take a[L]Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

description: Three Magnemite are linked by a strong magnetic force. Earaches will occur if you get too close.

name: Voltorb
description: It rolls to move. If the ground is uneven, a sudden jolt from hitting a bump can cause it to explode.

name: Electrode
description: The more energy it charges up, the faster it gets. But this also makes it more likely to explode.

name: Electabuzz

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage. If tails, this Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

description: Many power plants keep Ground-type Pokémon around as a defense against Electabuzz that come seeking electricity.

name: Jolteon

attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage for each heads.

description: It concentrates the weak electric charges emitted by its cells and launches wicked lightning bolts.

name: Zapdos

attacks.effect: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

description: This Pokémon has complete control over electricity. There are tales of Zapdos nesting in the dark depths of pitch-black thunderclouds.

attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.

name: Blitzle
description: When thunderclouds cover the sky, it will appear. It can catch lightning with its mane and store the electricity.

name: Zebstrika

attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

description: When this ill-tempered Pokémon runs wild, it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.

name: Tynamo
description: While one alone doesn’t have much power, a chain of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.

name: Eelektrik
description: They coil around foes and shock them with electricity-generating organs that seem simply to be circular patterns.

name: Eelektross

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

description: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.

name: Helioptile
description: When spread, the frills on its head act like solar panels, generating the power behind this Pokémon’s electric moves.

name: Heliolisk

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

description: One Heliolisk basking in the sun with its frill outspread is all it would take to produce enough electricity to power a city.

name: Pincurchin

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

description: This Pokémon generates electricity when it digests food. It uses its five hard teeth to scrape seaweed off surfaces and eat it.

name: Clefairy
description: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.

name: Clefable
description: A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people.

name: Abra

attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

description: This Pokémon uses its psychic powers while it sleeps. The contents of Abra’s dreams affect the powers that the Pokémon wields.

name: Kadabra
description: Using its psychic power, Kadabra levitates as it sleeps. It uses its springy tail as a pillow.

name: Alakazam

attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

description: It has an incredibly high level of intelligence. Some say that Alakazam remembers everything that ever happens to it, from birth till death.

name: Slowpoke
description: It is incredibly slow and dopey. It takes five seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.

name: Slowbro
description: When a Slowpoke went hunting in the sea, its tail was bitten by a Shellder. That made it evolve into Slowbro.

name: Gastly
description: It wraps its opponent in its gas-like body, slowly weakening its prey by poisoning it through the skin.

name: Haunter
description: It likes to lurk in the dark and tap shoulders with a gaseous hand. Its touch causes endless shuddering.

name: Gengar

attacks.effect: Your opponent can't use any Supporter cards from their hand during their next turn.

description: To steal the life of its target, it slips into the prey’s shadow and silently waits for an opportunity.

abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent can't use any Supporter cards from their hand.

name: Drowzee
description: It remembers every dream it eats. It rarely eats the dreams of adults because children’s are much tastier.

name: Hypno

abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

description: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of psi moves, such as Hypnosis and Confusion.

name: Mr. Mime

attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes -20 damage from attacks.

description: The broadness of its hands may be no coincidence—many scientists believe its palms became enlarged specifically for pantomiming.

name: Jynx

attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

description: Its strange cries sound like human language. There are some musicians who compose songs for Jynx to sing.

name: Mewtwo

attacks.effect: Discard 2[P]Energy from this Pokémon.

description: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene-splicing and DNA-engineering experiments.

attacks.effect: Discard 2[P]Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Ralts
description: The horns on its head provide a strong power that enables it to sense people’s emotions.

name: Kirlia
description: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the space around it and see into the future.

name: Gardevoir

abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may take 1[P]Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to the[P]Pokémon in the Active Spot.

description: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.

name: Woobat
description: While inside a cave, if you look up and see lots of heart-shaped marks lining the walls, it’s evidence that Woobat live there.

name: Swoobat
description: Emitting powerful sound waves tires it out. Afterward, it won’t be able to fly for a little while.

name: Golett
description: They were sculpted from clay in ancient times. No one knows why, but some of them are driven to continually line up boulders.

name: Golurk

attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 100 damage for each heads.

description: Artillery platforms built into the walls of ancient castles served as perches from which Golurk could fire energy beams.

name: Sandshrew
description: It loves to bathe in the grit of dry, sandy areas. By sand bathing, the Pokémon rids itself of dirt and moisture clinging to its body.

name: Sandslash
description: The drier the area Sandslash lives in, the harder and smoother the Pokémon’s spikes will feel when touched.

name: Diglett
description: It lives about one yard underground, where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears aboveground.

name: Dugtrio

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

description: Its three heads bob separately up and down to loosen the soil nearby, making it easier for it to burrow.

name: Mankey
description: It lives in groups in the treetops. If it loses sight of its group, it becomes infuriated by its loneliness.

name: Primeape

attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has damage on it, this attack does 60 more damage.

description: It becomes wildly furious if it even senses someone looking at it. It chases anyone that meets its glare.

name: Machop
description: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it’s the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.

name: Machoke
description: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

name: Machamp
description: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.

name: Geodude
description: Geodude that have lived a long life have had all their edges smoothed out until they’re totally round. They also have a calm, quiet disposition.

name: Graveler
description: It climbs up cliffs as it heads toward the peak of a mountain. As soon as it reaches the summit, it rolls back down the way it came.

name: Golem

attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.

description: When Golem grow old, they stop shedding their shells. Those that have lived a long, long time have shells green with moss.

name: Onix
description: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.

name: Cubone

attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon do -20 damage.

description: When the memory of its departed mother brings it to tears, its cries echo mournfully within the skull it wears on its head.

name: Marowak
description: This Pokémon overcame its sorrow to evolve a sturdy new body. Marowak faces its opponents bravely, using a bone as a weapon.

attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 damage for each heads.

name: Hitmonlee

attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

description: This amazing Pokémon has an awesome sense of balance. It can kick in succession from any position.

name: Hitmonchan
description: Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn.

name: Rhyhorn
description: Strong, but not too bright, this Pokémon can shatter even a skyscraper with its charging tackles.

name: Rhydon
description: It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.

name: Kabuto
description: This species is almost entirely extinct. Kabuto molt every three days, making their shells harder and harder.

name: Kabutops

attacks.effect: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

description: Kabutops slices its prey apart and sucks out the fluids. The discarded body parts become food for other Pokémon.

name: Mienfoo
description: In one minute, a well-trained Mienfoo can chop with its arms more than 100 times.

name: Mienshao
description: When Mienshao comes across a truly challenging opponent, it will lighten itself by biting off the fur on its arms.

name: Clobbopus
description: It’s very curious, but its means of investigating things is to try to punch them with its tentacles. The search for food is what brings it onto land.

name: Grapploct

attacks.effect: Switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench.(Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

description: A body made up of nothing but muscle makes the grappling moves this Pokémon performs with its tentacles tremendously powerful.

name: Ekans
description: By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow prey larger than itself. After a meal, it curls up and rests.

name: Arbok

attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

description: The latest research has determined that there are over 20 possible arrangements of the patterns on its stomach.

name: Nidoran♀

attacks.effect: Put 1 random Nidoran♂ from your deck onto your Bench.

description: Females are more sensitive to smells than males. While foraging, they’ll use their whiskers to check wind direction and stay downwind of predators.

name: Nidorina
description: The horn on its head has atrophied. It’s thought that this happens so Nidorina’s children won’t get poked while their mother is feeding them.

name: Nidoqueen

attacks.effect: This attack does 50 more damage for each of your Benched Nidoking.

description: Nidoqueen is better at defense than offense. With scales like armor, this Pokémon will shield its children from any kind of attack.

name: Nidoran♂
description: The horn on a male Nidoran’s forehead contains a powerful poison. This is a very cautious Pokémon, always straining its large ears.

name: Nidorino
description: With a horn that’s harder than diamond, this Pokémon goes around shattering boulders as it searches for a moon stone.

name: Nidoking

attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

description: When it goes on a rampage, it’s impossible to control. But in the presence of a Nidoqueen it’s lived with for a long time, Nidoking calms down.

name: Zubat
description: It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings. Even in tight caves, Zubat flies around with skill.

name: Golbat
description: It loves to drink other creatures’ blood. It’s said that if it finds others of its kind going hungry, it sometimes shares the blood it’s gathered.

name: Grimer

attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

description: Born from sludge, these Pokémon now gather in polluted places and increase the bacteria in their bodies.

name: Muk

attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 50 more damage.

description: It’s thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.

name: Koffing
description: Its body is full of poisonous gas. It floats into garbage dumps, seeking out the fumes of raw, rotting trash.

name: Weezing

abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may make your opponent's Active Pokémon Poisoned.

description: If one of the twin Koffing inflates, the other one deflates. It constantly mixes its poisonous gases.

name: Mawile

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

description: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.

name: Pawniard
description: Pawniard will fearlessly challenge even powerful foes. In a pinch, it will cling to opponents and pierce them with the blades all over its body.

name: Bisharp
description: This Pokémon commands a group of several Pawniard. Groups that are defeated in territorial disputes are absorbed by the winning side.

name: Meltan

attacks.effect: Take 1[M]Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

description: It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating liquid metal within its body is how it generates energy.

name: Melmetal

abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes -20 damage from attacks.

description: At the end of its life-span, Melmetal will rust and fall apart. The small shards left behind will eventually be reborn as Meltan.

name: Dratini
description: It sheds many layers of skin as it grows larger. During this process, it is protected by a rapid waterfall.

name: Dragonair
description: They say that if it emits an aura from its whole body, the weather will begin to change instantly.

name: Dragonite

attacks.effect: 1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen at random 4 times. For each time a Pokémon was chosen, do 50 damage to it.

description: It is said that somewhere in the ocean lies an island where these gather. Only they live there.

name: Pidgey
description: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

name: Pidgeotto
description: The claws on its feet are well developed. It can carry prey such as an Exeggcute to its nest over 60 miles away.

name: Pidgeot

abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench.(Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

description: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as Magikarp.

name: Rattata
description: Its incisors grow continuously throughout its life. If its incisors get too long, this Pokémon becomes unable to eat, and it starves to death.

name: Raticate
description: People say that it fled from its enemies by using its small webbed hind feet to swim from island to island in Alola.

name: Spearow
description: Its reckless nature leads it to stand up to others—even large Pokémon—if it has to protect its territory.

name: Fearow

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

description: Carrying food through Fearow’s territory is dangerous. It will snatch the food away from you in a flash!

name: Jigglypuff
description: When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

name: Wigglytuff
description: It has a very fine fur. Take care not to make it angry, or it may inflate steadily and hit with a body slam.

attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Meowth

attacks.effect: Draw 1 card.

description: All it does is sleep during the daytime. At night, it patrols its territory with its eyes aglow.

name: Persian

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

description: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.

name: Farfetch'd
description: The stalk this Pokémon carries in its wings serves as a sword to cut down opponents. In a dire situation, the stalk can also serve as food.

name: Doduo
description: A two-headed Pokémon that was discovered as a  sudden mutation. It runs at a pace of over 60 miles per hour.

name: Dodrio
description: An enemy that takes its eyes off any of the three heads—even for a second—will get pecked severely.

name: Lickitung

attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 60 damage for each heads.

description: If this Pokémon’s sticky saliva gets on you and you don’t clean it off, an intense itch will set in. The itch won’t go away, either.

name: Chansey
description: This kindly Pokémon lays highly nutritious eggs and shares them with injured Pokémon or people.

name: Kangaskhan

attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage for each heads.

description: Although it’s carrying its baby in a pouch on its belly, Kangaskhan is swift on its feet. It intimidates its opponents with quick jabs.

name: Tauros
description: When Tauros begins whipping itself with its tails, it’s a warning that the Pokémon is about to charge with astounding speed.

name: Ditto

attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon's attacks and use it as this attack. If this Pokémon doesn't have the necessary Energy to use that attack, this attack does nothing.

description: Its transformation ability is perfect. However, if made to laugh, it can’t maintain its disguise.

name: Eevee
description: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

name: Eevee
description: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

name: Eevee
description: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

name: Porygon

abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may look at the top card of your deck.

description: State-of-the-art technology was used to create Porygon. It was the first artificial Pokémon to be created via computer programming.

name: Aerodactyl

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent shuffles their Active Pokémon back into their deck.

description: This is a ferocious Pokémon from ancient times. Apparently even modern technology is incapable of producing a perfectly restored specimen.

name: Snorlax
description: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.

name: Minccino
description: The way it brushes away grime with its tail can be helpful when cleaning. But its focus on spotlessness can make cleaning more of a hassle.

name: Cinccino

attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

description: Its body secretes oil that this Pokémon spreads over its nest as a coating to protect it from dust. Cinccino won’t tolerate even a speck of the stuff.

name: Wooloo
description: Its curly fleece is such an effective cushion that this Pokémon could fall off a cliff and stand right back up at the bottom, unharmed.

name: Dubwool
description: Weave a carpet from its springy wool, and you end up with something closer to a trampoline. You’ll start to bounce the moment you set foot on it.

name: Gloom
description: Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor. The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance of 1.25 miles.

name: Pinsir

attacks.effect: Discard a[R]Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Rapidash

name: Squirtle
description: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

name: Gyarados

attacks.effect: Discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

description: Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly. Even rain can’t extinguish the fire.

name: Togepi
description: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.

abilities.effect: Whenever you attach a[D]Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, do 20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Cherrim

attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

description: After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cherrim takes this form. It’s full of energy while it’s like this, and its liveliness will go on until sundown.

name: Raichu

abilities.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks.

attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

description: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.

name: Nosepass

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks.

description: It moves less than an inch a year, but when it’s in a jam, it will spin and drill down into the ground in a split second.

name: Gible
description: It skulks in caves, and when prey or an enemy passes by, it leaps out and chomps them. The force of its attack sometimes chips its teeth.

name: Staraptor

abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks from[F]Pokémon.

description: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.

name: Manaphy

attacks.effect: Choose 2 of your Benched Pokémon. For each of those Pokémon, take a[W]Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to that Pokémon.

description: It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond with any kind of Pokémon.

name: Snorlax

attacks.effect: This Pokémon is now Asleep.

description: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.

attacks.effect: Discard 2[P]Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Cyclizar

attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Overacceleration attack does +20 damage.

description: Apparently Cyclizar has been allowing people to ride on its back since ancient times. Depictions of this have been found in 10,000-year-old murals.

name: Sprigatito

attacks.effect: Put 1 random[G]Pokémon from your deck into your hand.

description: Its fluffy fur is similar in composition to plants. This Pokémon frequently washes its face to keep it from drying out.

name: Floatzel

attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has damage on it, this attack does 60 more damage.

description: With its flotation sac inflated, it can carry people on its back. It deflates the sac before it dives.

name: Pawmot

abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

description: This Pokémon normally is slow to react, but once it enters battle, it will strike down its enemies with lightning-fast movements.

name: Machamp

attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra[F]Energy attached, this attack does 50 more damage.

description: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.

name: Ekans

attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

description: By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow prey larger than itself. After a meal, it curls up and rests.

name: Bidoof
description: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.

name: Pachirisu

attacks.effect: Take a[L]Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched[L]Pokémon.

description: It’s one of the kinds of Pokémon with electric cheek pouches. It shoots charges from its tail.

name: Riolu
description: They communicate with one another using their auras. They are able to run all through the night.

name: Exeggcute

attacks.effect: Take a[G]Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

description: Though it may look like it’s just a bunch of eggs, it’s a proper Pokémon. Exeggcute communicates with others of its kind via telepathy, apparently.

name: Froakie
description: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.

name: Farfetch'd
description: The stalk this Pokémon carries in its wings serves as a sword to cut down opponents. In a dire situation, the stalk can also serve as food.

name: Rayquaza

attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

description: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.

attacks.effect: 1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen at random 4 times. For each time a Pokémon was chosen, do 40 damage to it.
1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen at random 4 times. For each time a Pokémon was chosen, do 40 damage to it.

name: Mimikyu

attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your Pokémon.

description: There was a scientist who peeked under Mimikyu’s old rag in the name of research. The scientist died of a mysterious disease.

name: Cosmog

attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

description: Even though its helpless, gaseous body can be blown away by the slightest breeze, it doesn’t seem to care.

name: Lycanroc

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

description: Lycanroc attacks its prey with its sharp claws and fangs. It loyally obeys the instructions of a Trainer it trusts.

name: Alolan Exeggutor

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

description: Blazing sunlight has brought out the true form and powers of this Pokémon.

name: Alolan Ninetales

attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

description: A deity resides in the snowy mountains where this Pokémon lives. In ancient times, it was worshiped as that deity’s incarnation.

name: Crabrawler
description: This Pokémon punches trees and eats the berries that drop down, training itself and getting food at the same time.

name: Alolan Grimer

attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

description: There are a hundred or so of them living in Alola’s waste-disposal site. They’re all hard workers who eat a lot of trash.

name: Toucannon

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

description: They smack beaks with others of their kind to communicate. The strength and number of hits tell each other how they feel.

name: Zeraora

abilities.effect: At the end of your first turn, take a[L]Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

description: It electrifies its claws and tears its opponents apart with them. Even if they dodge its attack, they’ll be electrocuted by the flying sparks.

name: Kartana
description: This Ultra Beast’s body, which is as thin as paper, is like a sharpened sword.

name: Blacephalon

attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 70 damage to itself.

description: It slithers toward people. Then, without warning, it triggers the explosion of its own head. It’s apparently one kind of Ultra Beast.

name: Xurkitree

attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

description: Although it’s alien to this world and a danger here, it’s apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.

name: Dawn Wings Necrozma

attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

description: Lunala no longer has a will of its own. Now under the control of Necrozma, it continuously expels all of its energy.

name: Dusk Mane Necrozma

attacks.effect: Discard a[M]Energy from this Pokémon.

description: This is its form while it is devouring the light of Solgaleo. It pounces on foes and then slashes them with the claws on its four limbs and back.

name: Stakataka

attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

description: It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one appears to be made up of many life-forms stacked one on top of each other.

attacks.effect: Discard the top 5 cards of each player's deck.

name: Poipole

attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

description: This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to be chosen as a first partner in its own world.

name: Stufful
description: Its fluffy fur is a delight to pet, but carelessly reaching out to touch this Pokémon could result in painful retaliation.

attacks.effect: Take a[L]Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Vanillite

attacks.effect: If 1 of your Pokémon used Sweets Relay during your last turn, this attack does 20 more damage.

description: Unable to survive in hot areas, it makes itself comfortable by breathing out air cold enough to cause snow. It burrows into the snow to sleep.

name: Jolteon

attacks.effect: If this Pokémon evolved during this turn, this attack does 20 more damage.

description: It concentrates the weak electric charges emitted by its cells and launches wicked lightning bolts.

name: Alcremie

attacks.effect: This attack does 40 damage for each time your Pokémon used Sweets Relay during this game.

description: When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat them to berries it’s decorated with cream.

name: Dragonair

attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

description: They say that if it emits an aura from its whole body, the weather will begin to change instantly.

name: Audino

attacks.effect: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

description: This Pokémon has a kind heart. By touching with its feelers, Audino can gauge other creatures’ feelings and physical conditions.

name: Togedemaru

attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack, do 30 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

description: With the long hairs on its back, this Pokémon takes in electricity from other electric Pokémon. It stores what it absorbs in an electric sac.

name: Greedent

attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 50 more damage.

description: This Pokémon makes off with heaps of fallen berries by wrapping them in its tail, which is roughly twice the length of its body.

name: Eevee
description: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.
